backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling authorization, user profiles, and outcome session creation with context scans and event drift data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files and components used for implementation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a monochrome OKLCH color system with light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root that configures routing, theming, and global providers for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Top‑level layout with header, navigation, auth button, mobile menu, and footer wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication flow and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper component that blocks access to children unless the user is authenticated.
Renders an informational alert explaining the speculative nature and limitations of the app.
frontend/src/components/ErrorState.tsx: Displays an error alert with an optional retry button.
Shows a probability distribution for event drift categories and a trajectory indicator.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Provides skeleton placeholders for loading screens.
frontend/src/components/ProbabilityDebtP: Visualizes probability debt levels, warnings, and related trade‑off indicators.
frontend/src/components/UncertaintyToggl: Presents a toggle switch for enabling or disabling uncertainty injection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns authentication state and the caller's user profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, sessions, context scans, and recommendation generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContextScanPage.tsx: Form page for viewing and updating a session’s context scan, including stress, mood, environment, and notes, then saving via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, disclosure info, and the user’s sessions list with links to session details or creating a new session.
frontend/src/pages/NewSessionPage.tsx: Page for creating a new outcome session with outcome text, time horizon, and risk tolerance, then submitting to generate a session.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetailPage.tsx: Displays full session details, context scan data, recommendations, and allows regenerating recommendations or navigating to edit context.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAboutPage.tsx: Profile settings page where users edit location and preferences, plus sections for app information and probability debt.
React page that displays mock city-level uncertainty data with cards, alerts, and collective-effect lists for the Timeline Fracture feature.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app goals, architectural notes, required images, and existing feature definitions for GODMODE.
